vectorToStringArray

public static java.lang.String[] vectorToStringArray(java.util.Vector v)
This function converts a java.util.Vector containing String objects in an array of String objects.

Parameters:
v - a java.util.Vector object wich contains String objects.
Returns:
an array of String objects.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassCastException - if v contains an object which isn't a String.

useModelAsInput

public static Program useModelAsInput(Program p,
                                      Model m)
This function allows to use a Model computed by DLV as input for a new invocation.

Parameters:
p - A Program object.
m - A Model object.
Returns:
The program "p" after computation.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If "p" or "m" are null throws NullPointerException.

joinPrograms

public static Program joinPrograms(Program p1,
                                   Program p2)
This function allows to join two Program objects.

Parameters:
p1 - A Program object.
p2 - A Program object.
Returns:
The program obtained joining "p1" and "p2" (if "p1"=="p2" no operation is performed).
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - If either "p1" or "p2" are null throws NullPointerException.

javaToDlvString

public static java.lang.String javaToDlvString(java.lang.String myString)
This function quotes a java String passed as parameter. This function allows to build friendly terms.

Parameters:
myString - a String object to be quoted.

dlvToJavaString

public static java.lang.String dlvToJavaString(java.lang.String myString)
This function removes quotes from a java String passed as parameter.

Parameters:
myString - a String object.

resultSetToPredicate

public static Predicate resultSetToPredicate(java.sql.ResultSet rs,
                                             Predicate pr)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Import a javax.sql.ResultSet in a Predicate object.
Notice that this method automatically generate a PredicateMetaData for "pr" (if it does not exist) from the ResutSetMetadata object associated with "rs".

Parameters:
rs - A ResultSet to be imported in memory.
pr - A Predicate object.
Returns:
A Predicate object.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.

resultSetToPredicate

public static Predicate resultSetToPredicate(java.lang.String predicateName,
                                             java.sql.ResultSet rs)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Import a javax.sql.ResultSet in a Predicate object.
Notice that this method automatically generate a PredicateMetaData for "pr" from the ResutSetMetadata object associated with "rs".

Parameters:
rs - A ResultSet to be imported in memory.
predicateName - A String object representing the predicate name.
Returns:
A Predicate object.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.

resultSetToPredicate

public static Predicate resultSetToPredicate(java.sql.ResultSet rs,
                                             Predicate pr,
                                             TranslationMap map)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Import a javax.sql.ResultSet in a Predicate object with respect to a mapping function given by a TranslationMap object.
Notice that this method automatically generate a PredicateMetaData for "pr" (if it does not exist) from the ResutSetMetadata object associated with "rs" and the type conversion information given by the map "map".
Whereas a PredicateMetaData object exists for "pr" this method applies the conversion specified by "map".
For a running example see TranslationMap.

Parameters:
rs - A ResultSet to be imported in memory.
pr - A Predicate object.
map - A TranslationMap encoding a mapping function.
Returns:
A Predicate object.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.
See Also:
TranslationMap

predicateToResultSet

public static void predicateToResultSet(java.sql.Connection con,
                                        java.lang.String tableName,
                                        Predicate p,
                                        TranslationMap map,
                                        boolean replace)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
Exports a Predicate object in a database table with respect to a mapping function given by a TranslationMap object.
Notice that this method will perform that operation in a single database transaction (in a single JDBC Batch). If "replace" is set to true this method cleans the table "tableName" before storing "pr", otherwise it tries to insert tuples without checking for duplicates (this method may throw javax.sql.SQLException if any referential integrity constraint holds on "predicateName").
For a running example see TranslationMap.

Parameters:
map - A TranslationMap encoding a mapping function.
Returns:
A Predicate object.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.
See Also:
TranslationMap
